| 1 |  | q1pcl.q | |- Q = ( quot1p ` R ) |

| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( F Q G ) = ( F Q G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg1 ` R ) = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` P ) = ( -g ` P ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` P ) = ( .r ` P ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 8, 4 | #P_q1peqb | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. C ) -> ( ( ( F Q G ) e. B /\ ( ( deg1 ` R ) ` ( F ( -g ` P ) ( ( F Q G ) ( .r ` P ) G ) ) ) < ( ( deg1 ` R ) ` G ) ) <-> ( F Q G ) = ( F Q G ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. C ) -> ( ( F Q G ) e. B /\ ( ( deg1 ` R ) ` ( F ( -g ` P ) ( ( F Q G ) ( .r ` P ) G ) ) ) < ( ( deg1 ` R ) ` G ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. C ) -> ( F Q G ) e. B ) |
